default.title: Error
default.message: Something went wrong. Any text entered must only include letters a to z, hyphens, spaces and apostrophes. Please delete any special characters and try again.

session.title: Session timed out
session.message-1: Sorry, your session has timed out due to inactivity. Any information you may have entered has been deleted.
